caseTitle: Commissioner Inland Revenue, Chenab Zone, Faisalabad v. Abdul Hameed Labour Contractor C/o M/s Punjab Beverages Company Pvt Ltd Faisalabad
tagline: Interpretation of section 153(1)(c) of the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001 with regard to the rendering of labour and carriage services. Necessity of Federal Board of Revenue maintaining data bank of cases.
